mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_table (category, product_Name, image_Url, price, stock, description, created_date, last_modified_date) VALUES (#{category}, #{productName}, #{imageUrl}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{description}, #{createdDate}, #{lastModifiedDate});
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, category, image_Url, price, stock, description, created_date, last_modified_date FROM product_table WHERE product_id = #{productId}
